#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define gc getchar_unlocked()
#define pc putchar_unlocked
using namespace std;
typedef int ll;

//Fast Read
inline void read(ll & n)
{
	n = 0;
	char ch = gc; int sign = 1;
	while(ch < '0' || ch > '9'){if(ch == '-') sign = -1; ch = gc; }
	while(ch >= '0' && ch<= '9')
	{
		n = n*10 + ch - '0';
		ch = gc;
	}
	n *= sign;
}

//Fast print
inline void print(ll n)
{
	char ch[15];
	int ind=0;
	if(n<0)
    {
        pc('-');
        n *= -1;
    }
	if(n == 0)
	{
		pc('0');
	}
	while(n > 0)
	{
		ch[ind] = n%10 + '0';
		n /= 10;
		ind++;
	}
	while(ind--) pc(ch[ind]);
	pc('\n');
}

int f3(int n,int k)
{
    int ans=0;
    for(int i=2;i<=n;i++)
      ans= (ans+k)%i;
    return (ans+1);
}


int main()
{
    int n,k;
    read(n); read(k);
    int x,y;
    int ans=0;
    for(int i=2; i<=n; i++)
        ans = (ans+k)%i;
    print(ans+1);
    return 0;
}
